# Prismatic Spray (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 325

This spell causes seven shimmering, multicolored beams of light to spray from your hand. Each beam has a different power. Creatures in the area of the spell with 8 HD or less are automatically [[Blinded|blinded]] for 2d4 rounds. Every creature in the area is randomly struck by one or more beams, which have additional effects.


| **1d8** | **Color of Beam** |  |
|---|---|---|
| 1 | Red | 20 points fire damage (Reflex half) |
| 2 | Orange | 40 points acid damage (Reflex half) |
| 3 | Yellow | 80 points electricity damage (Reflex half) |
| 4 | Green | Poison (Frequency 1/rd. for 6 rd.; Init. effect death; Sec. effect 1 Con/rd.; Cure 2 consecutive Fort saves)\* |
| 5 | Blue | *[[Flesh to Stone (Spell)\|Flesh to stone]]* (Fortitude negates) |
| 6 | Indigo | Insane, as *[[Insanity (Spell)\|insanity]]* spell (Will negates) |
| 7 | Violet | Sent to another plane (Will negates) |
| 8 | Struck by two rays | Roll twice more, ignoring any “8” results |
